title: Coach LF team Any rank
body:
Coach looking to help any sort of team from bronze to challenger
Will help with analysing games and point out mistakes you might not see
willing to help with anything you want.
 I am Sliver 4 but don't think rank matters when it comes to coaching im very updated with ogn lcs and china and also the patch notes 
Add me in game : Mouthanator

replies.body:
You don't think rank matters when it comes to coaching? 

How are you going to coach a challenger ranked team if you yourself only have the ability to coach yourself to silver 4? I don't mean to be rude. But that's like having a person with a PhD in Nuclear Physics take advice from a 25 year old who read about a water balloon on wikipedia.

Montecrisco is only sliver? leviathian former coach of alliance is only gold

look I believe I have a decent game knowledge doesn't mean im the best player, if people want to give me go then they can doesn't matter about rank, I doubt any team above gold would but all im saying is im willing to give it a go, always gotta start somewhere

Some people have knowledge not mechanics!
Like me ...
...
...


qq mechanics.

agreed, some people are very good at analyzing and stratergies. but when it comes to reaction times and gameplan not very good

also having some1 look in from the outside will give you honest advice without bias, which makes a big diff
can you coach me? i'm bronze 2 and i main jungle and adc
